author: Football Italia Staff
description: Uruguay named their squad for the friendly against Italy on June 7, including Matias Vecino, Diego Laxalt, Edinson Cavani and Luis Suarez.
title: Uruguay squad for Italy friendly

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Italy lost their opening game of the Under-20 World Cup, beaten by a ferocious Uruguay free kick despite Andrea Zaccagno saving a penalty.
title: U20: Italy capitulate to Uruguay

author: HuffPost Video
description: Before Donald, there was Silvio. Accused of racism, xenophobia, sexism and corruption, Italy’s longest-serving Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi is eerily...
title: Remember Silvio Berlusconi, Italy's Version Of Donald Trump?

author: Alex Richards, Mick Gadd
description: The 35-year-old was involved in accident in Rimini, Italy, on Wednesday. He is survived by his fiancee Jackie Marin
title: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden dead after being struck by a car in Italy

author: Philip Pullella
description: Pope Francis is to elevate five Roman Catholic prelates from outside Italy and the Vatican to the rank of cardinal, the elite group of churchmen who are his closest advisers and can enter a conclave to choose his successor.
title: Pope names five new cardinals, all from outside Italy and the Vatican

author: Alessandra Potenza
description: ‘This is shit in Italy not ragù.’
title: My spirit lives in this Twitter account of Italians pissed off at bad food recipes

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Reports in Italy suggest Sunderland are considering Claudio Ranieri as the successor to David Moyes.
title: Sunderland consider Ranieri?

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Gonzalo Higuain spoke of his youth, surviving meningitis and having football in the blood. “Italy is most similar to Argentina.”
title: Higuain: 'I survived meningitis'

author: BBC Sport
description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Reports in Italy today suggest Juventus are interested in Andres Iniesta, if he decides to leave Barcelona.
title: Juventus in for Iniesta?
